com.quinsoft.zeidon

Interface Lockable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Task, TaskQualification, View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazyLoadLock, ViewForwarder

    public interface Lockable
    Zeidon objects that may be locked for exclusive access implement this interface.
    Author:
    DG

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReentrantReadWriteLock getLock() 

    • Method Detail

      • getLock

        ReentrantReadWriteLock getLock()
        Returns:
        Returns a reentrant read-write lock that can be used to control access to different Zeidon objects.
